Text:
No idea what it was, but 
 maybe it has somethin' 
 to do with the need for 
 all those miners?
Me and Raven are going \n to have a talk with the \n Council.
Raven: \n It's right ahead!
I'm from the Lhao \n Tribe, it's time I \n acted like it.
We'll find out what \n they're after. For now, \n don't do anything hasty.
They said they had a \n deal for me and Raven.
We sensed a new, terrible threat was looming, though we \n had no way of knowing just how close, or how big, that threat was...

Lisa, it'll be okay. 
 I'll talk to the Council 
 and make sure everyone 
 goes free.

I can't believe my 
 brother would make such 
 a deal with the 
 Council...
Raven: \n This rift plane is collapsing!
So just hang on, \n everything'll work out.

It sounds like we 
 don't have much 
 choice but to take 
 the Council's offer.

According to Vogo, if we 
 do what they want, 
 they'll release the 
 hostages.
I hate to say it, but I \n think you're right.
I'll be waiting by the \n entrance for you.
They won't last one \n minute down in the mines!
Not only that, but everyone from \n Jirga Para Lhao except the people in \n Lei Havina are being sent too.
Hurry, Raven!
Everyone from Banga is \n being sent to work the mines.
I can't risk trying \n anything with the \n hostages...
That's not what we agreed! \n Why aren't those wrinkly sacks \n of skin releasing our people!?
Now I see him sending me \n off was to keep me away \n from Banga...
The Garrison soldiers \n just showed up in Banga \n and Elgona!
I'll take care of the \n Banga Settlement.
Find your meaning in the mines!
They hauled some of us \n away...
Raven: \n We need to leave or we'll be stuck here forever.
I'm sorry.
Miners, we want you!
I'm the only one they \n released. Everyone else \n is still being held.
Thank you.
Oh! Hey Lisa, Kat's-
We barely made it out of that place with our lives, so we were \n understandably upset when Vogo told us the Council's new plans.

A unit inside the 
 Garrison went missing 
 after goin' out on a 
 special mission.
You're here.
Heard a rumour from some \n people comin' off the \n boats...
I've never felt so \n helpless before.
Head To the Rift
There seems to be some \n sort of disturbance down \n below.
They told me to hand \n over Banga's mining \n technology.
That's why they released \n me and sent me home.
How can he treat what's \n going on down there like \n it doesn't affect him?

They're sending us to our 
 deaths while they sit around 
 and get fat on our blood, 
 sweat, and tears.
I wish something would \n happen here. It's so \n boring.
Don't you think I know that!? \n But what can we do? \n They've made their decision.
Monsters! \n Monsters!
Help, \n somebody!
Seems like there's \n no good news \n around here...
Only you? \n But why?
There's our way out!
Banga's under the \n Garrison's watch.
The Council Elders...
Lisa, if only I could-
Should I go to the Council Hall first, or check in with Banga?
Let's head in and see \n what they have to say.

Yeah, let's get this 
 over with. The less I 
 have to talk to them, 
 the better.
Head Deeper In and \n Find the Expedition
With me.
Fancy place... \n Someone thinks \n they're important.
Quiet!
Enter, \n Shifter.
Are they for real?
Say what you \n brought us \n here to say.

Night Gale, you're 
 lucky you're not in 
 a cell yourself 
 for treason.
So young, so defiant. \n I like that spirit...
But it's time you learned \n to respect our power, one \n you'll never understand.
Authority.
Oh great, \n they're crazy.

Let's get down to business. 
 You're to explore a newly 
 discovered mining site with 
 unlimited potential.

We've received 
 unprecedented readings 
 of free-oscillating 
 gravitational waves
Its resources would \n be invaluable to \n our city.

However, we lost 
 contact with a 
 patrol we sent to 
 investigate.

You're to follow up. 
 Find and recover any 
 records left by the 
 missing patrol.
And the patrol? \n What about them?
We've got to consider \n Jirga Para Lhao's interests \n first and foremost.
We can't afford to \n lose the forest for a \n few trees.
Trees!?

That's easy for you to say, 
 sitting in your cushy council 
 chamber while you order 
 others to do all the work.

It's our duty to 
 guide our less 
 enlightened 
 citizens.
Sheep need \n shepherds.
First trees, \n now sheep?
Fine. \n But if we do this, \n you free the captives.
Let's \n go.
Uck! \n Raven!
I better stay close to the lights.
Let's just get this \n over with.
Yeah, get in, grab the \n records and get out.

They didn't even 
 care about the 
 people they sent 
 on that expedition...
They don't care about \n anything but money.

They're nothing but 
 old monsters, 
 sucking the city and 
 everyone in it dry.

And they won't rest 
 until everything 
 and everyone is 
 drained.
Raven seems to \n hate them more \n than anyone...
Why is it so dark here?
Yeah, the only place I \n can see is around the \n candles.
We'd better stay \n together. Who knows \n what's out there.
Right. Let's get going \n then.
The candles are lit!
We're good to keep going \n then.
I-I'm saved?
Are you one of the \n expedition? Where are \n the others?
They're gone... \n I'm all that's left.
We were investigating a \n rich ore pocket when \n we found the ruins...
That's when our \n airboat's engines gave \n out on us.
We were surrounded by \n Scarabs... My unit...
I was the last one, if \n you hadn't come along \n when you did...
You'll be okay, but we \n need to get you to a \n hospital.
B-But the expedition \n record, I can't go \n back without it!
We're searching for \n the record too.
Farther back... You'll \n find the city ruins and \n where we were ambushed.
I'll get him to safety, \n you find the record.
Got it! I'll head back \n once I find it.
M-My wife and son, \n I just want to \n see them again.
You will, I promise.
Is this some new power? \n I feel so light!
I'll bet I could fly \n even without shifting \n gravity now.
Hm? I feel my power \n flowing back into me.
I can shift gravity \n again!

This is where I ended 
 up after getting pulled 
 into the gravity storm 
 that hit Hekseville.
What happened back in \n Neu Hiraleon?
I can't remember, but \n there's no time for \n thinking about it now...
I need to find the \n crashed airboat and \n get that record.
I dropped the survivor \n off with the military.
Can you believe Neu \n Hiraleon ended up here?
Something doesn't feel \n right about all this.
I guess it got lost in \n the storm, like we did.
Did you find any other \n survivors?
No... Just the \n crashed airboat.
... \n Let's just grab the \n record and go.
Yeah...
Hmm... \n Is this the \n expedition record?

That's it! The survivor 
 described it to me 
 before I dropped him 
 off.
Well, that was easy. \n Guess it's time \n to head back then.
Huh?

Hey, check out this 
 picture. Isn't this the 
 Central Tower in Neu 
 Hiraleon?
Do you think the \n expedition took this?

Maybe... There's 
 something special about 
 that tower, let's take 
 the picture with us.
Look!
What's happening?
Whatever it is, it's not \n good. Get to the lights!
Hey, what's that!?
Hey, another one of those stone tablets.
Raven, we've got Nevi!
Raven: \n Got it, let's take 'em down.
Defeat all Enemies
Head Deeper In and \n Find the Expedition
We've got a big one!
Raven: \n Let's take it out.
Defeat all Enemies
Head Deeper In and \n Find the Expedition
A signal flare! It must be the expedition.
Raven: \n We should check it out.
Right.
Swarm? What's that mean?
They're fast! This must be the swarm the tablet mentioned.
Raven: \n Maybe we can use those shells lying around.
Defeat all Enemies
Huh? Never seen that kind of Nevi before...
Raven: \n Careful, we don't know what they can do.
Raven: \n Seems that way.
Head To the Signal Flare
I found someone!
We'd better help him.
Defeat the Nevi and \n Rescue the Survivor
Are you okay?
Raven: \n I'll get him to safety.
Hold on just a little longer.
Head Further In and \n Find the Giant City
Another stone tablet... What's that next to it?
There's gems up there, I wonder if I can get them?
Reach Your Destination \n with the Spring Jump
Collect the Precious Gems
Next up.
Reach Your Destination \n with the Spring Jump
Collect the Precious Gems
Doing good, but the next one doesn't look so easy.
Combine Your Jump and Evade \n to Reach Your Destination
Collect the Precious Gems
Okay, the rest of the gems are that way.
Collect the Rest of the \n Precious Gems
Phew, need to be careful not to fall again.
c Read the Inscription
c Investigate
Stone Tablet: \n Defeat your enemies to reveal the path.
Stone Tablet: \n Discover a method to defeat the swarm.
Stone Tablet: \n Defeat your enemies to reveal the path.
Stone Tablet: \n Use your new power to collect the treasure.
Stone Tablet: \n Continue without shifting gravity.
Stone Tablet: \n Defeat your enemies to reveal the path.
Stone Tablet: \n You hold the power to keep me safe.
Stone Tablet: \n Quickly defeat your enemies.
Huh? Maybe I can't go places where there's no light.
Shoot, did it again. I need to stay near the candlelight.
Enemies Defeated
Gems Collected
Oww, that's hot!
Enemy Distance to Tablet
Enemies Remaining
Defeat Your Enemies to \n Reveal the Path
Discover a Method to \n Defeat the Swarm
Defeat Your Enemies to \n Reveal the Path
Use your New Power to \n Collect the Treasure
Continue Without Shifting Gravity
Defeat Your Enemies to \n Reveal the Path
You Hold the Power to \n Keep Me Safe
Quickly Defeat Your Enemies
I wish I could shift, but this new power should work...
Head Further In and \n Find the Giant City
Another tablet. I hope now I can get back to normal.
Okay, time to get moving.
Use Your Rocket Jump \n to Reach Your Destination
Nice, where to now?
Use Your Rocket Jump \n to Reach Your Destination
Phew, need to be careful not to fall again.
I should try shifting again.
Head Further In and \n Find the Giant City
Okay, let's try this power out in a fight.
Use Your Combo Kick \n to Defeat the Nevi
Now for the ones in the air.
Use Your Wormhole Kick \n to Defeat the Nevi
Ah, it's those fast ones. Time to try my new power.
Use Your Wormhole Kick \n to Defeat the Nevi
This new power makes it a snap to take out quick Nevi.
Head Further In and \n Find the Giant City
So I can't let them get too close to the tablet...
Huh? Did I mess something up?
Did it!
Now for some on the ground.
How was that?
Now for some armoured ones...
Did it!
Defeat the Nevi before \n They Reach the Tablet
More!? They're coming from both sides.
Head Further In and \n Find the Giant City
Hmm, I think I did something wrong.
I can't tell them apart from the bubbles.
Guess I could always just blow them all away.
Nice!
More of 'em.
Take that!
How many are there!?
That's the last of 'em.
Defeat All Enemies \n Within the Time Limit
Head Further In and \n Find the Giant City
Is that... Neu Hiraleon?
Find Traces of \n the Expedition
Wait, is that...?
So this is where the expedition's boat crashed.
I don't think anyone could survive this...
Raven: \n Kat! There you are.
Raven!
Okay, better find that boat.
Raven: \n Hey, over here!
Nevi! Did they cause the crash?
Defeat all Enemies
That Nevi's huge!
Defeat the Giant Nevi
Raven: \n Let's take 'em down!
Got it!
Lisa, did they free the \n hostages? What about \n Cecie and Syd?
What are all these \n Nevi doing here?

I need to see what the 
 Council wants, but I'm 
 also worried about 
 Banga...

What are they doing with 
 those people? If only 
 there was something we 
 could-
Not sure, but you can bet \n that rift has something \n to do with it.
